import React from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import './Header.css' import Small_Logo from '../utils/img/Logo.png'; export function Header() { return (

Welcome to our Restaurant

About Us Menus Reserve Contact

); }
